column5: Hey guys, our group stays at Barbers resort in Minaki on the Winnipeg River Chain every year in July for a week. We spend time fishing pretty much everything, muskies, walleyes, smallmouths, but I've always wanted to go after lake trout. I understand there are lake trout on big sand, has anyone fished for them up there in July? Any advice or experience you are willing to share? I have caught them on other NW Ontario lakes trolling spoons behind dipsey divers, but never tried on the Winnipeg River Chain. Thank in advance.
Only fished big smallies there. Lake trout?

Big Sand in Minaki is not lake trout water. You might be thinking about another Big Sand Lake. There are lake trout upstream in Lake of the Woods so never say never but there certainly isn't a population of lake trout in Big Sand Lake.
Every once in a blue moon you hear of one being caught, but I have never seen this. It could happen as there is a lake trout lake that drains into big sand
